duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate raw materials purchasing, production scheduling, and shipping to ensure smooth production flow.
Establish production plans and priorities based on customer requirements.
Plan daily work schedule for hourly personnel in accordance with production plans and customer needs.
Coordinate customer shipping with sales offices and carriers to obtain the best prices and service.
Expedites shipping and deliveries as required to meet customer needs.
Prepare loading combinations for shipping finished products.
Maintain material inventory levels within pre-established objectives.
Resolve daily problems with material rejections and production changes due to equipment breakdowns.
Prepare material and product certificates and coordinate inspections as required.
Communicate CONTECH policies to production employees and employ practices consistent with these policies.
